DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to investigate if there is an association between the depth of anaesthesia and the presence of cognitive deterioration after surgery.
DOC.brief_title: Depth of Anaesthesia and Cognitive Dysfunction
DOC.criteria: Age above 60 Surgery in general anesthesia surgery > 1 hour ASA: 13 Dementia Excessive Use of alcohol or anxiolytics Unable to understand danish MMSE score < 24
